description: Represents a human or system actor within the application.

attributes.name: Identity
attributes.description: Unique information used to identify and authenticate the user.

attributes.name: Personal Details
attributes.description: Basic personal information about the user.

attributes.name: Status & State
attributes.description: Data points related to the user's account status and history.

attributes.name: Permissions & Roles
attributes.description: Defines the user's access rights and capabilities within the system.

relationships.name: Has a Profile
relationships.description: Each User is associated with one Profile, which holds personal information.

relationships.name: Belongs to Groups
relationships.description: A User can be a member of multiple Groups.

relationships.name: Created Content
relationships.description: A User can create multiple pieces of Content (e.g., posts, articles).
